bib.title: A deep learning approach to observational cosmology with Supernovae
bib.author: Johanna Pasquet
bib.abstract: Artist view, Credit: Todd Mason, Mason Productions Inc./LSST Corporation a 10-year survey of the sky first light in 2020 a 8.4-meter special three-mirror design, creating an exceptionally wide field of view, and has the ability to survey the entire sky in only three nights. 200 petabyte set of images and data products!
